name: reauthorization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
new official permission for something to happen, or the act of giving someone official permission to do something again: She is proposing the reauthorization of a bill providing educational funding for people with disabilities. The law is now awaiting re-authorisation.
More examplesFewer examplesSince expiry of the current authorization, we are waiting for reauthorization legislation.He gave a powerful speech opposing the reauthorisation of the program.She promised to support the re-authorization of the ban.The law comes up for reauthorization next year.
